body.name: BULLCAPTAIN Genuine Leather Sling Bag Mens Crossbody Backpack Hiking Casual Daypack Shoulder Chest Bag with USB Charging Port
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 18 hrs 1 min
features: ✔ GENUINE LEATHER – This leather sling bag made from 100% genuine hand-crafted retro leather for soft and comfortable. Leather surface give user breathing touch.The lining was made of polyester, smooth and durable.

✔ USB CHARGING PORT – For device more power requirement,this leather chest bag design to a outer USB charging port.Say goodby to mobile battery low.Free you hands, convenient charge your mobile where you go.Note:product is not including power bank.

✔ PERFECT SIZE - Dimension:7"x12"x3.5"(LxHxW), about 1 lbs, strap length: 51". This chest bag is a mini backpack, but it is a perfect size for taking to a day trip or shopping.And the crossbody bag has a adjustable shoulder strap up to 51",for long or short,easy to adjust.

✔ EXCELLENT DESIGN & STYLISH - We wanted to make the casual daypack practical enough but at the same time very trendy,4 hierarchic pocket and a buckle pocket special for cellphone up to 6.7 inch size.This vintage leather backpack is perfect for the stylish traditionalist with a taste for unique luxury and high quality craftsmanship.

✔ MULTI FUNCTION – Designed for multi purpose sling bag, can be used a casual sports sling bag, messenger bag, handbag, cross body bag, business bag, chest bag, shoulder bag, daily backpack, travel bag, golf bag, walking bag, purse backpack. For most occasion like cycling, riding, running, climbing, camping, hiking, shopping, walking, outing, travel, vacation, trip daily using.
body.description: QUALITY WARRANTY & MONEY BACK GUARANTEE What we provide is not only better product, but also best service. If there are any issues, we'll give you a full refund or replacement.No questions asked. We just want your 100% satisfaction instead of 99%. Fed up with the old over-sized backpack, that tire your trip? It is not as large as a backbag, but which you can put your sunglass,wallet,water bottle,Mini iPad,phone,headphone,camera,MP3,keys,books,and all both your daily items. I'd like to give you some suggestions here: It is great on the go, right size for day trips, not a very big bag but sufficient enough to carry your every day gadgetry. You can put cell phone, keys, pens, sunglasses, cell phone , jewelry, lipstick, watch, Mini ipad or something small but valuable in the shoulder bag, not suitable for laptops. If you still has no concept of the size, needn't be hesitated, becuase you got 30 days to return it and get full payment back. Great for both indoor and outdoor use including business, hiking, travel, camping, biking, sporting events,etc. Just right for keeping your essential belongings close and safe. It can be used as a Chest Pack, Business Leather Bag, Casual Sports Sling Bag, Single Shoulder Bags, Everyday Backpack, Messenger Bag, Travel bag. Product Feature: Material:100% genuine cowhide leather Size:7"x12"x3.5"(LxHxW) Net weight:about 1 lbs Strap length:51" Package included:1 * men sling bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We like it
reviews.reviewText: This is listed for men, but I bought it for the little woman. She Loves it and doesn’t mind it was list as a man’s Sling. I liked it also and ordered me one and both of us a matching wallet in colors that match the Sling she has and the one I ordered for me.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never thought I would

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a well designed , quality made , secure and good looking bag!
reviews.reviewText: i bought this bag to replace another new bag that was cheaply made and so insecure that the zippers didn't stay in place and i lost the contents of my bag including my wallet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My girlfriend brought this for her husband. He loves it she told me. Best gift

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hubby loves it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband as he carries keys, glasses, and wallet and hates hanging on to them everywhere he goes. It looks really nice. It’s small enough to not be a back pack but big enough to use. It doesn’t look feminine which odd what he was concerned about. The leather quality is nice. He’s actually gotten compliments from other men.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Men hand bag
reviews.reviewText: I love it and a lot of people think it is real nice. The material looks real plus the figures. Great purchase 👌

reviews.reviewText: Love it except the front zipper tag was missing. Requested a replacement
